constraints.label: Responsible Charge Requirement
constraints.definition: Legal and professional requirement that engineers maintain active engagement in work from conception to completion
constraints.impact: Mere post-preparation review insufficient to satisfy responsible charge
constraints.source_text: Reviewing drawings or documents after preparation without involvement in the design and development process does not satisfy the definition of Responsible Charge

constraints.label: Technology Non-Substitution Principle
constraints.definition: Technology must not replace or substitute for engineering judgment
constraints.impact: AI outputs must be critically evaluated, not blindly accepted
constraints.source_text: technology must never be a replacement of a substitute for engineering judgment

constraints.label: Confidentiality Prior Consent Requirement
constraints.definition: Client information cannot be shared without prior client consent
constraints.impact: AI tools receiving client data require client authorization
constraints.source_text: Per Code section II.1.c, confidential information can only be shared with prior consent of the Client

constraints.label: Competence Area Limitation
constraints.definition: Engineers may only practice in areas where they are qualified by education or experience
constraints.impact: Use of unfamiliar tools requires understanding their limitations
constraints.source_text: engineers must undertake assignments only when qualified by education or experience in the specific technical fields involved

constraints.label: Absence of AI Disclosure Mandate
constraints.definition: No universal professional requirement currently mandates disclosure of AI use in engineering work
constraints.status: No mandate, but ethical principles favor transparency
constraints.source_text: at the time of the BER's review of this case there is no universal guideline mandating AI disclosure

constraints.label: Direction and Control Requirement
constraints.definition: Engineers may only seal documents prepared under their direction and control
constraints.impact: AI-generated content must be brought under engineer's control before sealing
constraints.source_text: Engineers shall not affix their signatures to any plans or documents not prepared under their direction and control
